entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 6:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 8.
